value_i18n.en_US: Open Square Spaces is the ready-to-use collaboration and information portal. This out-of-the-box solution is compatible with your entire information ecosystem. It allows you to manage collaborative processes between users within the same organization as well as external collaborators.
The Enterprise Collaboration tool for your company

Open Square Spaces is the solution dedicated to sharing content that allows work teams to collaborate in real time.

Create shared spaces, Wiki and Forums and improve personal and business productivity.

Learn More

• Create a personal area
  • Manage collaborative spaces with other colleagues independently
  • Access the various company workspaces, projects, products and much more
  • Create and modify documents via browser even in co-editing mode
  • Read and publish communications on specific digital bulletin boards
  • Use calendars, forums, wikis and much more by seizing the opportunity to work remotely to optimize productivity
  • Deliverable on Saas and on Premises.

• Personal Productivity:
    • Personal Workspace
    • Document Management and Sharing
    • Calendar
    • Real Time Online Editing
    • Mail/Chat Videoconferencing
  • Sharing:
    • Collaboration Spaces
    • Newsfeed
    • Collaborative Editing
    • Calendar
    • Contact Book
  • Professional Productivity:
    • Project Sites
    • Community
    • Approval Workflow

SMC was established more than 40 years ago to improve our customers' performance. We create real solutions, not just software. We do it using always the most advanced open source developing technologies.


We pay great attention to the user experience and make it easy for our solutions to be introduced and integrated into your company. We are Liferay Platinum Partner, the most reliable and evolved platform for creating business portals.
